attributes.action: shut down the daily mail (aka fail)
attributes.additional_details: with a nasty, narrow-minded, middle aged audience, this is unacceptable and a paper that condones and encourages spiteful behaviour cannot be allowed to continue. it is also very cowardly, after the 'legs-it' headline was revealed and met with a hostile reception they spitefully told its readers who had a point to be offended to 'get a life', yet they have never posted a similar article since! Funny that isn't it? if you aren't rich, you're worthless to them. No, we are ALL equal humans. ALWAYS.
attributes.background: as a true british citizen and a decent human being, more importantly, aren't you sick and tired of waking up in the morning to find racist, right-wing, CAPITALISED scaremongering headlines from this pathetic excuse of a newspaper?

rejection.details:
You may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
